column4: http://en.linuxreviews.org/Bitlbee advises: "/connect im.bitlbee.org; /j #bitlbee." I have executed this. It continues advising: "help commands." This only lists the well-known irssi commands. It continues advising: "help quickstart," but irssi replies: "No help for quickstart." How to get rid of that message?
I will give it a try.
It works without the / in front. Thank you.
